response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe its worth exceeds $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product directly from us at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This represents a significant savings of $100,000 compared to the market value, making it a highly attractive proposition. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations in terms of return on investment and overall satisfaction. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1400000}
